Plot: A dissolute matinee idol is slated to appear on a live TV variety show.
Title: My Favorite Year
Writer: Norman Steinberg (screenplay), Dennis Palumbo (screenplay), Dennis Palumbo (story)
Actors: Peter O'Toole, Mark Linn-Baker, Jessica Harper, Joseph Bologna
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 7 nominations.
